Algoritma fill scale

Source: R/scale-fill.R
scale_fill_algo.Rd

Algoritma fill scale

scale_fill_algo(discrete = TRUE, mode = "light", ...)

Arguments

discrete

A logical to specify whether to scale the fill in discrete or continuous scale. Default to TRUE.
mode

The theme's mode; either "light" or "dark" mode.
...

Other arguments passed on to discrete_scale() or scale_fill_gradientn().

Details

Will be updated soon.

Examples


# import libs
library(ggplot2)
library(algothemes)

# an example visualization
p <- ggplot(iris, aes(x = Species, y = Sepal.Length)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(fill = Species))

p

# with theme_algo and scale_fill_algo
p +
  theme_algo() +
  scale_fill_algo()
